(ROOT
  (PP (IN With)
    (NP
      (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (JJ financial) (NN doom))
      (CC and)
      (NP
        (NP (NN gloom))
        (VP (VBG being)
          (VP (VBN reported)
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (DT the) (NN news) (NN daily))))))
      (, ,))))


root(ROOT-0, With-1)
predet(doom-5, all-2)
det(doom-5, the-3)
amod(doom-5, financial-4)
pobj(With-1, doom-5)
cc(doom-5, and-6)
conj(doom-5, gloom-7)
auxpass(reported-9, being-8)
partmod(gloom-7, reported-9)
prep(reported-9, in-10)
det(daily-13, the-11)
nn(daily-13, news-12)
pobj(in-10, daily-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT a) (NN lot))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (NNS people))))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (VP (VBG making)
        (NP (DT the) (JJ extra) (NN effort))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB look)
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP (JJ great) (NNS deals))))))))
    (. .)))


det(lot-2, a-1)
nsubj(making-6, lot-2)
prep(lot-2, of-3)
pobj(of-3, people-4)
aux(making-6, are-5)
root(ROOT-0, making-6)
det(effort-9, the-7)
amod(effort-9, extra-8)
dobj(making-6, effort-9)
aux(look-11, to-10)
xcomp(making-6, look-11)
prep(look-11, for-12)
amod(deals-14, great-13)
pobj(for-12, deals-14)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB So) (RB much) (RB so))
    (SBAR (IN that)
      (S
        (NP (PRP we))
        (ADVP (RB even))
        (VP (VBP have)
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (NN thread))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN forum))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP (NNS people)))))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB share)
                  (NP (NN information))
                  (PP (IN on)
                    (NP
                      (NP (JJ great) (NNS deals))
                      (VP (VBN called)
                        (S (`` ``)
                          (NP (NNP Hang) (NNP Cheng) (NNP Pai) (NNP Lobangs))
                          ('' '')))))))
              (, ,))))))))


advmod(so-3, So-1)
advmod(so-3, much-2)
root(ROOT-0, so-3)
mark(have-7, that-4)
nsubj(have-7, we-5)
advmod(have-7, even-6)
dep(so-3, have-7)
det(thread-9, a-8)
dobj(have-7, thread-9)
prep(thread-9, in-10)
det(forum-12, the-11)
pobj(in-10, forum-12)
prep(forum-12, for-13)
pobj(for-13, people-14)
aux(share-16, to-15)
infmod(thread-9, share-16)
dobj(share-16, information-17)
prep(share-16, on-18)
amod(deals-20, great-19)
pobj(on-18, deals-20)
partmod(deals-20, called-21)
nn(Lobangs-26, Hang-23)
nn(Lobangs-26, Cheng-24)
nn(Lobangs-26, Pai-25)
dep(called-21, Lobangs-26)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (RB hence) (DT the) (NN title))
    (PP (IN for)
      (NP
        (NP (NN today) (POS 's))
        (NN post)))
    (. .)))


advmod(title-3, hence-1)
det(title-3, the-2)
root(ROOT-0, title-3)
prep(title-3, for-4)
poss(post-7, today-5)
possessive(today-5, 's-6)
pobj(for-4, post-7)


(ROOT
  (PP (IN For)
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN benefit))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (DT those))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP who))
            (S
              (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
                (VP (VB understand)
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ above) (NN phrase))))))))
      (, ,))))


root(ROOT-0, For-1)
det(benefit-3, the-2)
pobj(For-1, benefit-3)
prep(benefit-3, of-4)
pobj(of-4, those-5)
nsubj(understand-9, who-6)
aux(understand-9, do-7)
neg(understand-9, n't-8)
rcmod(those-5, understand-9)
det(phrase-12, the-10)
amod(phrase-12, above-11)
dobj(understand-9, phrase-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (WDT which))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (JJ typical) (NNP Singaporean) (NN fusion))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNP Hokkien)
            (CC and)
            (NNP Malay) (NNS words)))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(fusion-6, which-1)
cop(fusion-6, is-2)
det(fusion-6, a-3)
amod(fusion-6, typical-4)
nn(fusion-6, Singaporean-5)
root(ROOT-0, fusion-6)
prep(fusion-6, of-7)
nn(words-11, Hokkien-8)
cc(Hokkien-8, and-9)
conj(Hokkien-8, Malay-10)
pobj(of-7, words-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S (`` ``)
      (NP (NNP Hang) (NNP Cheng) (NNP Pai))
      ('' '')
      (VP (VBZ means)
        (NP (`` ``)
          (NP (NNP Bad) (NNP Situation))
          ('' '')
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (NNP Hokkien))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (`` ``) (NNP Lobang) ('' '') (RB literally))
      (VP (VBZ means)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN hole))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (NNP Malay))))))
    (. .)))


nn(Pai-4, Hang-2)
nn(Pai-4, Cheng-3)
nsubj(means-6, Pai-4)
root(ROOT-0, means-6)
nn(Situation-9, Bad-8)
dobj(means-6, Situation-9)
prep(Situation-9, in-11)
pobj(in-11, Hokkien-12)
cc(means-6, and-13)
nsubj(means-18, Lobang-15)
advmod(Lobang-15, literally-17)
conj(means-6, means-18)
det(hole-20, a-19)
dobj(means-18, hole-20)
prep(hole-20, in-21)
pobj(in-21, Malay-22)


(ROOT
  (SBARQ (CC But)
    (WHADVP (WRB how))
    (SQ (MD can)
      (NP (DT a) (`` ``) (NN hole) ('' ''))
      (VP (VB help)
        (NP (PRP you))
        (UCP
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (DT a) (JJ bad) (NN situation)))
          (CC and)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB how))
            (S
              (VP (VBD did)
                (SBAR
                  (S
                    (NP (DT the) (NN word) (`` ``) (NN Lobang) ('' ''))
                    (VP (VBP come)
                      (S
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB mean)
                            (NP
                              (NP (DT some) (NN sort))
                              (PP (IN of)
                                (NP (NN tip))))
                            (PP (RP off)
                              (PP (IN for)
                                (NP (DT a) (JJ great) (NN deal))))))))))))))))
    (. ?)))


cc(help-8, But-1)
advmod(help-8, how-2)
aux(help-8, can-3)
det(hole-6, a-4)
nsubj(help-8, hole-6)
root(ROOT-0, help-8)
dobj(help-8, you-9)
dep(help-8, in-10)
det(situation-13, a-11)
amod(situation-13, bad-12)
pobj(in-10, situation-13)
cc(in-10, and-14)
advmod(did-16, how-15)
conj(in-10, did-16)
det(Lobang-20, the-17)
nn(Lobang-20, word-18)
nsubj(come-22, Lobang-20)
ccomp(did-16, come-22)
aux(mean-24, to-23)
xcomp(come-22, mean-24)
det(sort-26, some-25)
dobj(mean-24, sort-26)
prep(sort-26, of-27)
pobj(of-27, tip-28)
prep(mean-24, off-29)
prep(off-29, for-30)
det(deal-33, a-31)
amod(deal-33, great-32)
pobj(for-30, deal-33)
